column2: අවසා   නලස  නිගම ය  කළ  හැකි  වන්නන්  ඉල්ුේකාරිය  නමම  ඉඩම  සින් ක්කර
ඔප්පුවකින්  වගඋත්තරකරුට   වරා  ඇති   මුත්  එය  විකිණිනේ  අදහසින්  න ාව  තමා  ලබාගත්  ණය
මුදලට  ඇ යක් නලස උකස්කරයක ස්වරූ නයන් බව තීරණය කරමු” (“X 3”)

column1: The  petitioner  states  that  being  aggrieved  by  the  Judgment  dated  17.02.2023  he  filed  this

column2: Application in the nature of Writ of Certiorari. The Judgment of the Debt Conciliation Board dated
17.02.2023 is subject to Judicial Review under the grounds stated in paragraphs 7(a) to 7(d) of
the Petition. In terms of Article 140 of the Constitution this Court has powers to judicially review
the aforesaid judgment. The petitioner states that the Judges of the Debt Conciliation Board had
fixed this case for mention on 04.04.2023 for the payment of money. It was argued on behalf of
